thread.title: On the Balance of Collective and Individual

author: wsjcom
title: On the Balance of Collective and Individual
text:
Crispin Sartwell argues that “forming a single consciousness from apparently disparate people is central to the Western conception of government” (“In Collective Identities, We Both Lose and Find Ourselves,” op-ed, Feb. 10). It is but only one of the many options that Western thinkers have suggested constitutes a just political system.
